channel.description:
Watch stories about everything going on in the world, and participate in the discussion. Pop culture, unusual people, celebrities, movies, music, politics, injustices and everything else in-between. This is a place for debate about everything happening on Planet Earth. Me: I've been 
bartending for over 20 years and seen just about everything that can happen in a bar. Part of my job is to check the news daily and have things for my clientele to have spirited discussions about. It just seemed natural to do the same thing with Youtube videos. So fire away when you 
disagree with me, just don't get too vile. 

I'm also a low budget horror filmmaker. I have written & directed several low budget horror opuses, all available to see on Amazon. They are
 "Bubba's Chili Parlor", "Evidence Of A Haunting", "Alien Zombie Invasion", and "Art Of Survival".
channel.title: Lord Spoda
channel.keywords: "Current news" "pop culture" "weird news" blog "video blog" news "unusual stories" "world stories" "today's pictures" "Lord Spoda" "news reports" documentary U.S.A. "France News" "England News" "Japan News" "China News" "Brazil News" "German News" "Australia News" "Russia News" "Middle East News"

snippet.title: Lord Spoda
